analyzed: milindapañha
mahāvagga
ananta kāya pañha
atha kho milindassa raññaḥ etat ahosi

original: “paṇḍito kho ayaṁ bhikkhu paṭibalo mayā saddhiṁ sallapituṁ, bahukāni ca me ṭhānāni
analyzed: paṇḍitaḥ kho ayam bhikkhu paṭibalaḥ mayā saddhim sallapitu bahukāni ca me ṭhānāni

original: pucchitabbāni bhavissanti, yāva apucchitāniyeva tāni ṭhānāni bhavissanti, atha sūriyo
analyzed: pucchitabbāni bhavissanti yāva tāni ṭhānāni bhavissanti atha sūriyaḥ

original: atthaṁ gamissati, yannūnāhaṁ sve antepure sallapeyyan”ti.
analyzed: attham gamissati yat nūna aham sve antepure sallapeyyanti
atha khalu rājā devamantiyam etat avoca

original: “tena hi tvaṁ, devamantiya, bhadantassa āroceyyāsi ‘sve antepure raññā saddhiṁ sallāpo bhavissatī’”ti.
analyzed: tena hi tva devamantiya bhadantassa āroceyyāsi sve antepure raññā saddhim sallāpaḥ bhavissati iti

original: Idaṁ vatvā milindo rājā uṭṭhāyāsanā theraṁ nāgasenaṁ āpucchitvā rathaṁ abhirūhitvā “nāgaseno nāgaseno”ti sajjhāyaṁ karonto pakkāmi.
analyzed: idam vatvā milindaḥ rājā uṭṭhāya āsanā theram nāgasenam āpucchitvā ratham abhirūhitvā nāgasenaḥ nāgasenaḥ iti sajjhāyam karontaḥ pakkāmi

original: Atha kho devamantiyo āyasmantaṁ nāgasenaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha khalu devamantiyaḥ āyasmantam nāgasenam etat avoca
rājā bhante milindaḥ evam āha
sve antepure raññā saddhim sallāpaḥ bhavissati iti
suṭṭhu iti theraḥ abbhānumodi

original: Atha kho tassā rattiyā accayena devamantiyo ca anantakāyo ca maṅkuro ca sabbadinno ca yena milindo rājā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu, upasaṅkamitvā rājānaṁ milindaṁ etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: atha kho tassāḥ rattiyāḥ accayena devamantiyaḥ ca anantakāyaḥ ca maṅkuro ca sabbadinno ca yena milindaḥ rājā tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā rājānam milindam etat avocu
āgacchatu mahā rāja bhadantaḥ nāgasena uti
āmaḥ āgacchatu uti
kittakehi bhikkhūhi saddhim āgacchatu uti

original: “Yattake bhikkhū icchati, tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ āgacchatū”ti.
analyzed: yattake bhikkhū icchati tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhim āgacchatu uti
atha kho sabbadinnaḥ āha
āgacchatu mahā rāja dasahi bhikkhūhi saddhinti
dutiyam pi khalu rājā āha

original: “yattake bhikkhū icchati, tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ āgacchatū”ti.
analyzed: yattake bhikkhū icchati tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhim āgacchatu uti
dutiyam pi kho sabbadinnaḥ āha
āgacchatu mahā rāja dasahi bhikkhūhi saddhinti
tatiyam pi khalu rājā āha

original: “yattake bhikkhū icchati, tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ āgacchatū”ti.
analyzed: yattake bhikkhū icchati tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhim āgacchatu uti
tatiyam pi kho sabbadinnaḥ āha
āgacchatu mahā rāja dasahi bhikkhūhi saddhinti

original: “Sabbo panāyaṁ sakkāro paṭiyādito, ahaṁ bhaṇāmi ‘yattake bhikkhū icchati, tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ āgacchatū’ti.
analyzed: sabbaḥ pana ayam sakkāraḥ paṭiyāditaḥ aham bhaṇāmi yattake bhikkhū icchati tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhim āgacchatu uti

original: Ayaṁ bhaṇe sabbadinno aññathā bhaṇati, kiṁ nu mayaṁ nappaṭibalā bhikkhūnaṁ bhojanaṁ dātun”ti?
analyzed: ayam bhaṇe sabba dinnaḥ aññathā bhaṇati kim nu mayam na paṭibalāḥ bhikkhūnam bhojanam dātunti
evam vutte sabbadinnaḥ maṅku ahosi

original: Atha kho devamantiyo ca anantakāyo ca maṅkuro ca yenāyasmā nāgaseno tenupasaṅkamiṁsu, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ nāgasenaṁ etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: atha kho devamantiyaḥ ca anantakāyaḥ ca maṅkuro ca yena āyasmā nāgasenaḥ tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam nāgasenam etat avocuḥ
rājā bhante milindaḥ evam āha

original: ‘yattake bhikkhū icchati, tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ āgacchatū’”ti.
analyzed: yattake bhikkhū icchati tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhim āgacchatu uti

original: Atha kho āyasmā nāgaseno pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya asītiyā bhikkhusahassehi saddhiṁ sāgalaṁ pāvisi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā nāgasenaḥ pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya asītiyā bhikkhu sahassehi saddhim sāgalam pāvisi

original: Atha kho anantakāyo āyasmantaṁ nāgasenaṁ nissāya gacchanto āyasmantaṁ nāgasenaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha khalu ananta kāyaḥ āyasmantam nāgasenam nissāya gacchantaḥ āyasmantam nāgasenam etat avoca

original: “bhante nāgasena, yaṁ panetaṁ brūsi ‘nāgaseno’ti, katamo ettha nāgaseno”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena yam pana itam brūsi nāgasena uti katamaḥ ettha nāgasena uti
theraḥ āha
kaḥ pana ittha nāgasenaḥ uti maññasi iti

original: “Yo so, bhante, abbhantare vāto jīvo pavisati ca nikkhamati ca, so ‘nāgaseno’ti maññāmī”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ bhante abbhantare vātaḥ jīvo pavisati ca nikkhamati ca so nāgasenaḥ ti maññāmi iti

original: “Yadi paneso vāto nikkhamitvā nappaviseyya, pavisitvā na nikkhameyya, jīveyya nu kho so puriso”ti?
analyzed: yadi pana eso vātaḥ nikkhamitvā na paviseyya pavisitvā na nikkhameyya jīveyya nu kho so puriso ti
na hi bhantā iti

original: “Ye panime saṅkhadhamakā saṅkhaṁ dhamenti, tesaṁ vāto puna pavisatī”ti?
analyzed: ye panime saṅkha dhamakā saṅkham dhamenti tesam vātaḥ punar pavisati iti
na hi bhantā iti

original: “Ye panime vaṁsadhamakā vaṁsaṁ dhamenti, tesaṁ vāto puna pavisatī”ti?
analyzed: ye panime vasadhamakāḥ vasam dhamenti tesam vātaḥ punar pavisati iti
na hi bhantā iti

original: “Ye panime siṅgadhamakā siṅgaṁ dhamenti, tesaṁ vāto puna pavisatī”ti?
analyzed: ye panime siṅga dhamakā siṅgam dhamenti tesam vātaḥ puna pavisati iti
na hi bhantā iti
atha kissa pana te na maranti iti

original: “Nāhaṁ paṭibalo tayā vādinā saddhiṁ sallapituṁ, sādhu, bhante, atthaṁ jappehī”ti.
analyzed: na aham paṭibalaḥ tayā vādinā saddhim sallapitu sādhu bhante attham jappehi iti

original: “Neso jīvo, assāsapassāsā nāmete kāyasaṅkhārā”ti thero abhidhammakathaṁ kathesi.
analyzed: na esaḥ jīvaḥ assāsa passāsāḥ nāma ete kāya saṅkhārā ti theraḥ abhidhamma katham kathesi
atha ananta kāyaḥ upāsaka ttam paṭivedesi iti
ananta kāya pañho catuttho
